content.name: screen_side
content.label: Screen Side
content.gloss: the top side with computer screen

content.name: base_side
content.label: Base Side
content.gloss: the base side with keyboard and other core components

content.name: connector
content.label: Connector
content.gloss: connector between the screen side and base side

content.name: screen_frame
content.label: Screen Frame
content.gloss: frame of the screen of the computer

content.name: camera
content.label: Camera
content.gloss: camera on the top of the screen

content.name: touchpad
content.label: Touchpad
content.gloss: a computer input device in the form of a small panel containing different touch-sensitive areas

content.name: button
content.label: Button
content.gloss: left or right button of the touchpad
